attributes.action: extradite the royal family and replace them with Pokémon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the so called "royal family" being adored and admired as our true patrons, why should we still bow down to ornamental monarchs of German descent? We should replace the Queen with Pikachu, the most famous of Pokémon, and the rest of the royal  family with other species of the entertaining series, such as a Squirtle for Prince William, an Eevee for the Duchess of York, and a Donphan for Prince Charles.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
